byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt and Yasir Ghazi contributed reporting from Baghdad, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

abstract: Kurdish militants kill at least 24 Turkish soldiers in attack near Iraq border and Turkey's military responds by sending hundreds of troops into northern Iraq in counterattack on Kurdish insurgent hide-outs.
snippet: After Kurdish militants killed at least 24 Turkish soldiers, Turkey’s military responded by sending hundreds of troops into northern Iraq in a counterattack on Kurdish insurgent hide-outs.
lead_paragraph: After Kurdish militants killed at least 24 Turkish soldiers, Turkey’s military responded by sending hundreds of troops into northern Iraq in a counterattack on Kurdish insurgent hide-outs.

headline.main: Turkey Pursues Kurdish Rebels After 24 Soldiers Are Killed Near Iraq
headline.print_headline: Turkey Pursues Kurdish Rebels After 24 Soldiers Are Killed Near Iraq
headline.seo: Turkey Pursues Kurdish Militants After Attack Kills 24 Soldiers
